title: Estadio Presbítero Bartolomé Grella
text: Estadio Presbítero Bartolomé Grella is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Paran%C3%A1%2C%20Entre%20R%C3%ADos">Paraná</a>, <a href="Argentina">Argentina</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="Patronato%20de%20Paran%C3%A1">Patronato de Paraná</a>. The stadium has a capacity of 23,500 spectators and it opened in 1956.
